对新玩家的建议是，如果你不是很喜欢非对称竞技类游戏而且理解力有待加强的话，就不要坚持玩下去了，有朋友在玩这个游戏的话一定要邀请他和你一起玩，他会非常乐意带你玩耍的。还有，有非对称基础的玩家（比如网易那边来的），也是记得把你之前的游戏和这个游戏分开来理解。如果你很喜欢这款游戏，新人就请坚持下去，同时建议看视频准备实操的小伙伴们，不要上手就护士女鬼兔妈（有基础的也是一样），可以试试幽灵这种的，不要因为四跑就失了脾气，当然有人惹你不高兴针对他打一打也是可以的。对外记得说这个游戏一点也不恐怖谢谢，争取早日得到直播解禁。
花钱的话，这个游戏本身的花销不是很贵，高级套装均价在40，人物28买俩，遇到喜欢的套装花钱买也是很合适的（隔壁138一个紫皮我很不理解），尽量以DLC的形式购买角色，最后，通行证是可以永久续购的（你买通行证要1000暗金细胞然后肝完累计会给你1000暗金细胞，你可以拿这些继续买下一次的通行证）

Do not play this until they fix the matchmaking.  I made the mistake of buying during the Steam sale, and they changed matchmaking the next day.  You'll be in constant matches against high ranked, skilled players and you'll never have a chance to learn new killers or earn perks to catch up with them.  I've played for 11 hours today and won three games because they all have maxed perks and I have a fresh character I don't know how to play.  Fun game otherwise, but it's not currently playable unless you were lucky enough to farm your perks and stuff before the matchmaking change.

Great game that I wish I took advantage of playing it years ago when i first bought it. Just ignore the toxic players and follow A few basic game etiquette for the fun of all players, but don't sweat it if you say fuck it and have fun your way. You'll never make everyone happy. I suggest watching a few videos to help get of the hump as a new player as there Is much to understand on the flow of the game and what you may encounter.

I don't learn a lot of the newer games that easily.  I installed this game, didn't like it because it doesn't explain much in the tutorials. Then I uninstalled it.  I repeated this pattern about 6 times.  Once I had some people to play with that could explain the game, it started to become more fun.  119 hours into the game so far and I still don't know that much but don't take it seriously and just enjoy it.  It's one of those games that gets better the more you play.  Now, I'm lovin' it and having a good time.  Still have no idea what all the killer powers are but having fun and that's what it's about. fun.

Pode parecer irônico, mas eu curto bastante esse game. Estou dando uma análise negativa como forma de chamar atenção para alguns problemas do jogo. Acredito que a microtransação seja o principal deles. O game saiu em 2016 e de lá pra cá nunca foi lançado nenhum personagem gratuito pro jogo, então boa sorte aí campeão. Os personagens que são de outras empresas até dá pra entender, (Freddu Krogger, Michael etc) porém não lançar os personagens da própria desenvolvedora de graça é um absurdo. Sim, é possível comprar alguns personagens com um dinheiro específico do jogo, porém demora HORRORES (tipo mais de 50h) para conseguir comprar ao menos um deles.
O jogo é sim bem criativo, e certamente vc vai se divertir porém o descaso da desenvolvedora chega a ser ridículo. Uma das piores desenvolvedoras que já vi. Fiz essa análise negativa para chamar atenção dos futuros jogadores.

After many hours of this promising game the flaws with the incompetent balancing issues and constant bugs became apparent. The devs will never fix this game due to their short sighted and literal no incentive to fix it. I wish It wasn't so but this game started out as lighting in a bottle and ended as another wasted IP. I highly advice not playing this game ever or giving Behavior any attention. They promised game health improvements during the three year anniversary stream yet the game got worse. I have completely gave up on this game and its a fucking shame. Now I have moved on to more rewarding fun games. I feel like I wasted my time with this and that is the worst sin a video game can ever commit.

如果有新手，想加入這個遊戲，個人老實說，是勸退的，官方偏袒倖存者的情形太過嚴重，至於是如何偏袒，其他論壇上面都有更加詳細的論述，這就不提了，外掛也是猖獗，且官方的配對系統也是爛到一個不行，要嘛就是四個人皇對一個菜鳥新手，不然就是一個鬼皇對上四個人類菜鳥，然後在道具方面的一些改動也是極其不得人心，現在這遊戲的情況已經變成了倖存者超級多，鬼超級少，妳想玩人，準備排到天荒地老吧，請官方及其不重視亞州方的心得，只重視歐美地區的，偏偏歐美地區的人技術幾乎是一個比一個還爛，導致他們覺得難玩就喊削弱，偏偏官方又照單全收，現在的皮臉跟電鋸殺手都改完了，皮臉buff有感，而電鋸殺手，爛到一個爆炸，我真的不懂，只使用技能來進行遊戲是一個錯嗎?電鋸殺手有多難練所有人都知道，為何玩鬼的人得受到這種對待?反正現在我對這款遊戲的心態就是偶爾玩玩，也不花錢了，反正官方也不重視亞州區的遊戲體驗，那就這樣吧

Un juego 4vs1, donde en pocas palabras los 4 sobrevivientes deben reparar motores para poder abrir las puertas de salida y poder escapar,  ayudándose mutuamente y escapando del asesino. Si tienes paciencia, verás que hay muchas cosas de las que aprender, por lo que las horas de juego serán bastante... A continuación haré un listado de lo bueno, lo malo y lo feo:
a) Lo Bueno:
      - Es muy entretenido, tanto de jugar con amigos de sobrevivientes como jugar de asesino.
      - Tiene su nivel de dificultad, por lo que los rangos no son tan regalados (cada asesino requiere su cierto manejo).
      - Tendrás muchas horas de juego, donde cada vez que juegues aprenderás algo nuevo.
      - Actualizan constantemente agregando nuevo y entretenido contenido, y si aparece un bug, los desarrolladores no demoran en arreglarlo.
b) Lo malo: 
      - La gran mayoría de la comunidad es tóxica, pero mayormente entre sobrevivientes-asesino.
      - A veces puedes llegar a frustrarte bastante, debido a los sobrevivientes aleatorios que no saben jugar bien, o si vas de asesino puede que te toque un equipo de sobrevivientes que sean tóxicos.
      - A pesar de la rápida respuesta de los desarrolladores, el juego tiene una cantidad considerable de bugs.
c) Lo feo:
      - Bubba camper
En resumen: Te recomiendo comprarlo solo si está en oferta, ya que a pesar de ser un juego muy bueno, debes comprar algunas dlc para obtener ciertos sobrevivientes y asesinos.

Dead by Daylight is always on sale but it's not just $7.99 because you will spend for DLC and skins later on. It's a trap.

I don't think that anyone can really deny the level of hatred and toxicity in DBD. This game fulfilled with bugs, glitches, unbalance gameplay, toxic players and disgusting community. What a pretty combo huh?

If you are seeking for unhappy life or something to bring you down then wait no more. Dead by Daylight is your real answer.

The real fight begins in end-game chat. Even death can't keep your mouth shut.
